name: Spicy Black Bean Vegetable Soup
author: Anonymous
summary: Half of the black beans in this spicy soup are pureed with tomatoes, the other half are simmered with carrots, onion and kernels of corn.
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained
directions: In large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat; cook onion, garlic, and carrots, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until onion is softened
Add chili powder and cumin; cook, stirring, for 1 minute
Add stock, 1 can of the beans, corn, and pepper; bring to boil
Meanwhile, in food processor or blender, puree together tomatoes and remaining can of beans; add to pot
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 10 to 15 minutes or until carrots are tender
